methods.name: CheckpointElimination
methods.logic: Constructor for the CheckpointElimination class. Likely initializes the reducer with a graph editor.

methods.name: ~CheckpointElimination
methods.logic: Destructor for the CheckpointElimination class. Uses the default destructor, which likely handles cleanup of resources.

methods.name: reducer_name
methods.logic: Returns the name of the reducer, which is "CheckpointElimination". This is used for debugging and logging purposes.

methods.name: Reduce
methods.logic: The main reduction method. It attempts to simplify the given node, and returns a Reduction object representing the result of the reduction.

methods.name: ReduceCheckpoint
methods.logic: Handles the reduction of checkpoint nodes. This method likely identifies and eliminates redundant checkpoints in the graph.
